NewsArticle.Title: February Events
NewsArticle.Content:
Starting February 14-17, all registered accounts will receive 10% Extra Experience and Ability Points gained through monster kills, quest rewards, etc.
From February 18-21, all registered accounts will receive 50% Extra Experience and Ability Points gained through monster kills, quest rewards, etc.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The "Heart Puppet" and "Divine Love Ring" will also be available during this time.
((This event is open to all registered players. It will begin on February 14th and continue until February 28th.))
**February Itemshop will be re-released during this time.**
